name: Stella B's Leg Lovies, Black & Skulls
description:
All Leg Lovies Ship Free!
DESTASHING:
**Select Listings are priced to sell quickly!
**Photos were taken quickly with a quick-edit. Please don't hesitate to convo about colors!

When you purchase this listing, you will receive the pair in the first picture: Black w/ White, Gray & Hot Pink skulls.

Please leave sizing choice during checkout..

Sizing Options:
"Regular": 12-16 inches
"Infant": 8-10 inches
All Leg Lovies will be made in the "Regular" size unless otherwise noted or requested by seller.

All of my "Leg Lovies" have tapered cuffs to help prevent slipping down over the feet and seams are trimmed to help them lay flat and to cut down on the bulk. I have been making these for my girls and wouldn't consider selling them if I wasn't more than satisfied with the quality of the product!

Why Leg Lovies are so great:

*Leg Lovies provide extra warmth for all ages on cooler days!
*Pair them with a onesie, dress or skirt and they make diaper changing a cinch! (No off and ons!)
*They protect your lil crawler from chaffed knees!
*Use them as Arm Lovies for those cool autumn mornings!
*And, they are just so darn cute!

I am not a Leg Lovie wholesaler. I buy patterns that I find cute and would put on my own girls so I don't always have an excess of each pair.

name: Ready To Ship Scrumptious Autumn Picot Beanie
description:
OOAK (One of A Kind) and RTS (Ready to Ship)

Size: Newborn - up to 14" head circumference

Yarn: Super soft and luxurious Araucania yarn - hand dyed in Chile. 75% baby Alpaca/18% Silk/7%polyamide (type of nylon)
My camera makes the oranges a little more brassy than they actually are. This yarn is soooooooooooooo soft and would make the perfect fall/autumn photo prop for a newborn! Picot edging gives it a bit more pop.
